page.title: 12Housing Cont.
page.content: Home improvements increase the value of homes,save on fuel bills, but we think most people also like to keep up with their neighbours. Most of the inhabitants here are working class although some of the houses do indicate some people can afford more stylish housing than others. The planners have managed to create a pleasant and varied urban area by breaking up long lines of terraced houses,painting brickwork different colours,putting closes ,curves and crescents in the street pattern.They have also given some thought to peoples lives ,for instance old peoples flats and bungalows are handy for the local shops.
